frameDefinitions: A Suspect in a Current_jurisdiction is forced by Authorities (of the Current_jurisdiction) to go to the Crime_jurisdiction, i.e. the jurisdiction which requested that the Suspect be handed over for trial for a crime which he or she is suspected to have committed in the Crime_jurisdiction.
An Exporter moves Goods across a border from an Exporting_area to an Importing_area.
In this frame, an Agent or Cause changes the duration of an Event.
An Entity undergoes some change (the Event) that is (or is construed as) punctual.
An Executive_authority exchanges one penalty, the Original_punishment, for another less severe one, the New_punishment.
An Agent resumes participation in an Activity.
frameExamples: The fraud was <t>extradited</t> from Venezuela to the US.
Several companies actually make most of their income by <t>exporting</t> goods out of the country.
Don't let him <t>prolong</t> the discussion to an absurd length.
This <t>happens</t> to me all the time.
On December 15, 1971, Governor Winfield Dunn conditionally <t>commuted</t> his sentence to twenty years.
Normal Service Will Be <t>Resumed</t> Shortly. CNI
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Authorities</fen> act on behalf of the <fen>Current_jurisdiction</fen>, giving up the <fen>Suspect</fen> to the Crime_jurisdiction.
The jurisdiction (generally a nation) the <fen>Suspect</fen> starts off in.
The jurisdiction (generally a nation) to which the <fen>Suspect</fen> is sent.
The Suspect is forced to go to the jurisdiction where a crime he or she is suspected of took place or is being tried.
The time at which  the <fen>Suspect</fen> is moved.
The location where the extradition occurs.

The conscious entity, generally a person, that moves the <fen>Goods</fen> across a border out of the <fen>Exporting_area</fen>.  

Very often, an <fen>Exporting_area</fen> will metonymically stand in for the person or persons directly responsible for the movement of the <fen>Goods</fen>.  In such cases the constituent should be labeled <fen>Exporter</fen> on the first layer and with the appropriate locational role on the second layer.
The items of value whose location is changing.
The role <fen>Importing_area</fen> is the place that the <fen>Goods</fen> end up as a result of motion.
The place where the <fen>Goods</fen> are initially, before the the <fen>Exporter</fen> moves them.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Exporter</fen> moves the <fen>Goods</fen>.
The sentient entity that changes the duration of the <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Event</fen>'s duration is changed.
An event that causes the change in Event duration.
The time at which the change in duration of the Event is caused.
This role identifies the event which occurs and affects the <fen>Entity</fen>.
This role identifies the entity, concrete or abstract.
This role identifies the time when the event occurs.
This role identifies where the event takes place.
The constitutionally specified authority who has the power to commute punishments.
The punishment the <fen>Offender</fen> was originally sentenced to.
The time at which the <fen>Original_punishment</fen>  is commuted.
The location where the <fen>Executive_authority</fen> commutes the <fen>Original_punishment</fen>.
The <fen>Activity</fen> which is being resumed by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> who resumes an <fen>Activity</fen> that they were engaged in earlier.
When the Activity is resumed.
Where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>French officials</fex> extradited him back to Canada.
Jones was extradited <fex>from Mexico</fex> last Thursday to face criminal charges in the United States.
It was the third time a neo-Nazi was extradited from Denmark <fex>to Germany</fex>.
A hearing on whether or not to extradite <fex>Johnson</fex> to Isreal will be held tomorrow.
<fex>In Europe</fex> they extradite more freely than in North America.
<fex>The U.S.</fex> exports most of its peanut products.
Don't let <fex>him</fex> prolong the discussion to an absurd length.
Don't let him prolong <fex>the discussion</fex> to an absurd length.
<fex>Rain</fex> so cruelly cut short the game against Bangladesh.
<fex>Last week</fex>, he unnecessarily prolonged the agony, thinking that he could tough it out.
Hearst was sentenced to seven years in prison. 1979, <fex>President Jimmy Carter</fex> commuted Hearst's prison sentence after she served nearly two years.
I had learned after all of this period of time has passed the court was about to let (Bush) pay a sum of money and commute <fex>her sentence</fex> to time served.
Israel <fex>yesterday</fex> commuted the lengthy prison terms of seven Jews convicted of murdering or plotting to kill Arabs.
We have renewed <fex>our efforts to gain federal recognition</fex>.
<fex>We</fex> renewed our efforts to get things completed.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: SAGA OF THE SYMBIONESE LIBERATION ARMY
the Berkeley Peace and Justice Commission
